info: Our company is located in Mongolia, Ulaanbaatar city, specializing in foreign trade import and export, established in 2006, our company is involved in agriculture, building materials, ceramic tableware, jewelry and other trading business companies. Now we have 80 employees with more than 10 years of experience in foreign trade and have rich practical experience in solving various problems.
watch shop info: Our extensive jewelry and watch portfolio includes renowned brands such as MICHAEL KORS, Daniel Wellington, Swarovski, Seiko, CASIO (including G-SHOCK), Citizen, TISSOT, and TAG HEUER. We also work closely with Shenzhen Longbo Watch Co., Guangzhou Baishengniu Industrial Co., and SANDA Watch Co.
building material info: We collaborate with Shandong Lantian New Material Technology Co. to provide top-tier building materials.
agriculture info: KMEAKA LIMITED proudly manages 1,000 hectares of land dedicated to wheat cultivation, contributing to the agricultural landscape.
Ceramic Tableware info: Our commitment to quality extends to the table with partnerships like Tangshan Furende Co., offering exquisite ceramic tableware.
